index.pagetitle: Analyze your page against web performance best practice rules and using metrics
index.pagedescription: How fast is your site? How good does it follow web performance best practice rules? Find out by using sitespeed.io.
index.tab.settings.placeholder: Enter a URL to test. The hostname need to match
index.tab.scripting.scriptname: Name of your script, the name need to match regex [-a-zA-Z0-9\._-]
index.tab.scripting.recommendation: Auto complete/code completion works best in Visual Studio code
index.waitingtestrunners: Waiting for test runners to come online.
index.inqueue: There are %s jobs in the queue and your job is place %s in the queue
search.input.placeholder: Write the URL and use commands like date: %s
search.help.heading: Search commands
search.help.description: You can combine your search commands. To find a test for a URL, date and browser you can search like this
search.help.bydate: The date of the test run.
search.help.beforedate: Tests that run before that date.
search.help.afterdate: Tests that run after that date.
search.help.byday: You can use: today|yesterday|lastweek|lastmonth to get the tests that happened then.
search.help.bybrowser: Find tests by browser: chrome, firefox, edge, safari
search.help.bytesttype: Find tests by test type: desktop, emulatedMobile or android.
search.help.byurl: Find tests by a URL. The URL must start with http and the search will do an equal match. If you want to search partial URLS use the url: command.
search.help.byurlwithwildcard: Find tests by a URL. The URL will wildcard search the beginning and end of the URL so you can use it to search for part of a URL. For example %s will match %s
search.result.label: Label
search.result.nomatch: No tests found matching the search criteria.
search.pagedescription: Here you can search for finished tests.
error.validation.missingurlorscripting: You need to either add a URL or use scripting.
error.validation.nomatchingtestwithid: There are no test with id %s
error.missingresultbaseurl: Missing resultBaseURL setup for sitespeeed.io. You need to fix that in your configuration.
error.urlnotvalid: The URL %s is not a valid URL
error.nonmatchingdomain: The URL %s do not match the configured regex for the hostname %s
